ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: APEC thermal plasma model with variable abundances and velocity broadening as a free parameter. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: A version of the xsvapec model. Thermal line broadening is automatically included.

The current version of the AtomDB atomic database accessed by XSpec Apec models is 2.0.1, and may be changed by appropriately setting the APECROOT variable used by the XSpec model, using the Sherpa set_xsxset() command (e.g., 'set_xsxset("APECROOT", "1.2.0")'; see 'ahelp set_xsxset' for details).
This is an additive model component.

ROW.DATA: Abundances for He, C, N, O, Ne, Mg, Al, Si, S, Ar, Ca, Fe, Ni with respect to Solar. Abundances are set by the set_xsabund command.
10^-14 / (4 pi (D_A*(1+z))^2) Int n_e n_H dV, where D_A is the angular size distance to the source (cm), n_e is the electron density (cm^-3), and n_H is the hydrogen density (cm^-3)

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7.1 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.1.

BUGS.PARA: For a list of known bugs and issues with the XSPEC models, please visit the XSPEC bugs page.
